column7: Protocols, specification techniques, global states and their determination, reliable broadcast, transactions and commitment, security, and real-time systems. Same as ECE 428. 3 or 4 undergraduate hours. 3 or 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CS 241 or ECE 391.
